attributes.action: Dont turn our system like the U.S no matter what, Protect our Rights an Values.
attributes.additional_details: Our country is great, it just needs a few changes with certain issues. But at the same time we need to protect the positive things to keep a good standard of living.
attributes.background: We dont know where Brexit will lead us, but we dont want an American style system. Protect womens rights for abortion. Keep Universal Healthcare. Keep good standards of fresh foods.. not artifical like U.S. Im worried if we turn out like the U.S it could destroy our freedoms and values.
